Actions.Name: Battalion of Limbs
Actions.Effect: After the royal guard damages a foe with this attack, they mark that foe. This mark can be placed on any number of characters and stacks indefinitely. For each stack of the mark, this attack deals +[D] on hit or miss. A character can save against this mark at the end of their turn to clear all stacks, but only if they are not adjacent to the royal guard.

Actions.Name: Ball Lightning
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 must save. On a failed save, they take [D]+fray and are electrified, then as an area effect any of their allies in range 2 of them take fray damage.

Actions.Name: Vortex
Actions.Description: Characters in range 2 of the royal guard are shoved 1 towards it.

Actions.Name: Wind of Obliteration
Actions.Effect: The Royal Guard dashes 2, then deals [D] to all adjacent characters, then shoves them 1. It gains phasing during this action.
